title: sometimes client doesn't open
body:
yep. you open it, get white screen instead of the client. force quit, reload, won't open. happened about 20 times in the last few days.

why is it so hard to make a stable client? it was stable before...

replies.body: Same thing with me has started happening ever since the beta came out! I've reinstalled once but I don't want to reinstall every single time I want to play. I have tried restarting, I've done the userkernel replacement thing with original dmg file and it hasn't worked. Every time I try open league it comes up with "Another instance of league client is running. Please close it and try again" even though I don't have anything else open....Help!

Open your Task Manager and check to see if LolClient.exe, LoLLauncher.exe or LoLPatcher.exe are running. If there is right click LolClient.exe and force close it by selecting the 'End Process Tree' option. This will close down all parts of the LoL client that may be running in the background and should help get the GUI working as intended.

Sorry I'm noob at tech stuff where is task manager? I'm on a mac >.<


I'm currently reinstalling ugh seems like I just gotta keep the client open and go back to click on it a few times so it doesn't log me out. So shit it was working fine on my laptop before

errr sorry, I only work on computers.

Good luck sorting out your problem.
